newsitem.title: USA: US OPTIONS FOCUS/Big roll in Adobe LEAPS.
newsitem.headline: US OPTIONS FOCUS/Big roll in Adobe LEAPS.

text.p: An investor rolled a sizable position in Adobe Systems Inc long term equity anticipation securities (LEAPS) and another did a big straddle in a couple of June options on shares of WorldCom Inc, traders said Thursday.
The Adobe January 1998 30 put and January 1998 35 put each traded 8,000 contracts.
"That was a customer buying the 35s and selling the 30s," an options trader at the Pacific Stock Exchange said. "Just rolling up from a previous position."
Open interest in the 30 put was 8,046, but only 131 in the 35 put.
Few other Adobe options were busy. The most active was the February 40 call, which traded about 260 contracts.
Adobe shares were up 7/16 at 39-1/8 in afternoon trade.
In other activity, an investor sold the WorldCom June 27-1/2 straddle 5,000 times, traders said.
They said a customer sold the options and the market maker bought them.
The June 27-1/2 put, down 3/4 at 2-1/2, traded 5,080 contracts and the same call traded 5,065 contracts. It was up 11/16 at 2-1/2.
Also in WorldCom, an investor bought the February 25 calls 2,100 times and sold the March 27-1/2 calls, the options trader said.
By afternoon, the February 25 had volume of nearly 2,500 contracts and the March 27-1/2 call had volume of about 2,870 contracts.
WorldCom shares were up 1-1/8 at 27-1/4. ((--G.Crawford, 312 408 8750/Email: derivatives@reuters.com))
